freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate: <#list rows as row> <#assign subRegionName>${row["Sub-region Name"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign subRegionId>${subRegionName?lower_case?replace(' ','_')?replace('-','_')}</#assign> <#assign m49Code>${row["Sub-region Code"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign regionName>${row["Region Name"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign regionId>${regionName?lower_case}</#assign> create custom-table-row m49_sub_region "${subRegionId}" custom-table-row m49_sub_region "${subRegionId}" set field display_name "${subRegionName}" set field m49_code "${m49Code}" set link-target m49_region "custom-table-row/m49_region/${regionId}" exit </#list>
